comments.body:
[Comment on "See the [README](..//www/README.md) in the www directory for more information" from line 4 -- unfortunately it's not possible to directly comment on lines that aren't changed in the PR]

I would suggest moving this sentence to a new section at the end of the doc, something ilke

```
## More information

For more information, see the [README](../www/README.md) in the www directory for more information. 
```

I don't think it's a good idea for people to jump over to that page until they've gone through everything on this page. That page is super-confusing and I'm not sure all of it is even completely accurate anymore.

[Comment on Running locally / Running remotely]

I would suggest flipping the order of these two sections -- I think the more common case is that people will be running the cluster remotely, so better to put that one first.

Also, I would get rid of "You can also use other web servers to serve the contents of the www/app directory, as described [here](../www/README.md#serving-the-app-during-development)." -- I think this is confusing (web servers other than what? why would I want to use another web server?), and anyway people can find this info if they follow the link you already provide to that doc.
